channel.title: Small qeustion
channel.description: i have a question I'm itching to get answered. So i know people have made games with SCAR but how do u actually publish the games so they can be played with out being ran by SCAR? Or how do I make a Game with SCAR?

item.title: Small qeustion
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

Ide think it would be best to make the entire game not using scar. Learnign java and stuff would be good for making a game I think. Best to just make the game using something else i think.

Although, scar can still make great 2D* games.

Read full topic

item.title: Small qeustion
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

mod robby:

i have a question I’m itching to get answered. So i know people have made games with SCAR but how do u actually publish the games so they can be played with out being ran by SCAR?

Most easiest way is to convert to a language that can make things runnable without it, or java since MOST computers since 2000~? have java preinstalled.

mod robby:

Or how do I make a Game with SCAR?

Look up the drawing functions or the script FastDrawTest.scar in C:\Program Files\SCAR\scripts\test.

Read full topic
